comments.body: I think it's better to clarify ml.NaiveBayes supports Multinomial NB and Bernoulli NB. Meanwhile, we should provide the link to corresponding documents. You can refer [the NaiveBayes API doc](https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/mllib/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/ml/classification/NaiveBayes.scala#L67).

comments.body: Thanks for taking a look. The wiki link already provided a good overall introduction to Naive Bayes. I'll add some clarification. And in the mllib documents, it clarifies naive Bayes supports both Multinomial and Bernoulli.
